#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define Pair pair<long long,int>
using namespace std;

int vis[101][1<<10];
int Dig[101];
int CS = 1;
Pair dp[101][1<<10];
long long a[101];
Pair cmp(Pair a, Pair b)
{
    if(a.first == b.first) {
        return a.second > b.second ? a : b;
    }
    return (a.first > b.first ? a : b);
}

Pair func(int ind,int Mask)
{
    if(ind < 0) {
        return make_pair(0,0);
    }
    if(vis[ind][Mask] == CS) return dp[ind][Mask];
    vis[ind][Mask] = CS;
    Pair r = func(ind-1 , Mask);
    if((Dig[ind] & Mask ) == 0) {
        Pair r2 = func(ind - 1 , Mask | Dig[ind]);
        r2.first += a[ind];
        r2.second ++;
        r = cmp(r,r2);
    }
    
    return dp[ind][Mask] = r;
}
string tstring(long long a)
{
    string ans;
    do{
        ans.push_back(a%10+'0');
        a/=10;
    }while(a);
    reverse(ans.begin(), ans.end());
    return ans;
}
int main()
{
    int n;
    while(scanf("%d",&n)==1) {
        for(int i = 0; i < n ; i ++ ) {
            scanf("%lld",&a[i]);
            
            string s = tstring(a[i]);
            Dig[i] = 0;
            for(int j = 0; s[j] ; j ++ ) {
                Dig[i] |= 1 << (s[j]-'0');
            }
        }
        Pair lb= func(n-1,0);
        printf("%d\n", lb.second);
        CS ++;
    }
}
